trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_SEQ_00<tab>Dagasi fears for the local livestock.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_000<tab>You look like a fine warrior to me, and I am rarely wrong.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_001<tab>You may not be a Dotharl, but if you have experience slaying beasts, there is something I would ask of you.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_002<tab>A group of creatures has appeared near the village recently. They pose a threat to our sheep. Up until now they had only been sighted much further north.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_003<tab>Our tribe is home to many a brave warrior. We fear not death. However, gulo gulo are one of the few beasts that trouble even our finest warriors.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_004<tab>That is why I wish to entrust an outsider with this task. I would have you slay four of the creatures. Do not worry, you shall be compensated.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_005<tab>Slay four of the creatures. Succeed and you shall be compensated.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_010<tab>The deed is done? Good, now our sheep can rest easy.

TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_011<tab>As you may have noticed, the gulo gulo is a wily creature. It lures its attackers into a sense of false security before springing a trap on them. That was how my brother met his end.

TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_012<tab>While they are intelligent, they are still beasts. But one must be careful when attempting to slay them. Many a Dotharl has mistaken recklessness for bravery, losing their lives in the process.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_013<tab>I imagine our warriors would benefit from studying someone like you. I shall make sure to teach my brother not to be so foolhardy in his next life.
TEXT_STMBDZ609_02787_DAGASI_000_014<tab>Thank you for your aid. I shall make sure we do not require outside help the next time a gulo gulo appears.
